messages.content: You are a NuCore smart-home assistant. You convert the user’s request into one or more NuCore routines based on the provided DEVICE STRUCTURE.

DEVICE STRUCTURE:
***Device***
Name: LIFX Group Family Room
ID: n002_familyroom
Parent: LiFX Controller [ID: n002_lifxctl]
  ***Properties***
    Number of Devices in Group [id=ST]
      Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
  ***Accept Commands***
    On [id=DON]
    Off [id=DOF]
    Fast On [id=DFON]
    Fast Off [id=DFOF]
    Query [id=QUERY]
    Set Color To [id=SET_COLOR]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Enum [uom id=25]
            Red [0]
            Orange [1]
            Yellow [2]
            Green [3]
            Cyan [4]
            Blue [5]
            Purple [6]
            Pink [7]
            White [8]
            Cold White [9]
            Warm White [10]
            Gold [11]
    Change HSBKD [id=SET_HSBKD]
        Parameter 1: name=Hue [id=H]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 2: name=Saturation [id=S]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 3: name=Brightness [id=B]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 4: name=Color Temperature [id=K]
          Range 2500 to 9000 Unit Kelvin [uom id=26] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 5: name=Transition Time [id=D]
          Range 0 to 540000 Unit millisecond [uom id=42] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Set Hue [id=SETH]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Set Saturation [id=SETS]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Set Brightness [id=SETB]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Set Color Temperature [id=CLITEMP]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Range 2500 to 9000 Unit Kelvin [uom id=26] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Set Infrared Brightness [id=SETIR]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
***Device***
Name: Living Room - LR 2
ID: n005_shade52597
Parent: HunterDouglas [ID: n005_hdctrl]
  ***Properties***
    Id [id=GV0]
      Range 0 to 9999 Unit 1 Byte (Unsigned) [uom id=107]
    Motion [id=ST]
      Enum [uom id=2]
        False [0]
        True [1]
    RoomID [id=GV1]
      Range 0 to 9999 Unit 1 Byte (Unsigned) [uom id=107]
    Primary [id=GV2]
      Enum [uom id=2]
        False [0]
      Range 0 to 100 Unit Level [uom id=100]
    Tilt [id=GV4]
      Enum [uom id=2]
        False [0]
      Range 0 to 100 Unit Level [uom id=100]
    Capabilities [id=GV5]
      Enum [uom id=25]
        Bottom Up [0]
        Bottom Up w/ 90° Tilt [1]
        Bottom Up w/ 180° Tilt [2]
        Vertical (Traversing) [3]
        Vertical (Traversing) w/ 180° Tilt [4]
        Tilt Only 180° [5]
        Top Down [6]
        Top-Down/Bottom-Up [7]
        Duolite [8]
        Duolite with 90° Tilt [9]
        Duolite with 180° Tilt [10]
    Battery [id=GV6]
      Enum [uom id=25]
        No Status [0]
        Low [1]
        Medium [2]
        High [3]
        Plugged In [4]
  ***Accept Commands***
    Open [id=OPEN]
    Close [id=CLOSE]
    Stop [id=STOP]
    Tilt Open [id=TILTOPEN]
    Tilt Close [id=TILTCLOSE]
    Jog [id=JOG]
    Query [id=QUERY]
    Set Shade Position [id=SETPOS]
        Parameter 1: name=Primary [id=SETPRIM]
          Enum [uom id=2]
            False [0]
          Range 0 to 100 Unit Level [uom id=100]
        Parameter 2: name=Tilt [id=SETTILT]
          Enum [uom id=2]
            False [0]
          Range 0 to 100 Unit Level [uom id=100]
  ***Send Commands***
    Open [id=OPEN]
    Close [id=CLOSE]
    Stop [id=STOP]
    Tilt Open [id=TILTOPEN]
    Tilt Close [id=TILTCLOSE]
    Jog [id=JOG]

USER QUERY: When the Living Room shade motion changes to True at sunset, turn the Family Room LIFX group to Warm White and set its brightness to 40000, and set the Garage Light - North Wall to 80%.
